heartEvent.triggerHint: Check your mail after reaching 8 hearts.
heartEvent.wikiDescription: Abigail sends you a letter (signed "Abby") inviting you to visit her in her room.

heartEvent.triggerHint: After receiving a letter from Abigail, enter Pierre's General Store between 8pm and 10pm when she's there.
heartEvent.wikiDescription: When you arrive, Abigail shows you her spirit board. It reveals a message that indicates she's starting to develop feelings for you. She gets embarrassed and rushes you out of her room. Regardless of how you entered the store, you will end up outside.

heartEvent.triggerHint: Exit the farmhouse after seeing the 8 hearts cutscene.
heartEvent.wikiDescription: Abigail visits you and apologizes for her behavior.
